game.name: A Princess' Tale
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What happens when the fate of the world falls into the hands of the most irresponsible bubblehead to ever trip over royal birth? Play this 16-bit style old-school RPG and find out!
game.shortDescriptionEn: What happens when the fate of the world falls into the hands of the most irresponsible bubblehead to ever trip over royal birth? Play this 16-bit style old-school RPG and find out!

reviewHighlights.text: I played through this game to the end, largely because it was pretty short. It wasn't bad or anything, but I honestly wouldn't recommend it to others....
Right now I wouldn't recommend A Princess Tale at this price. There are several spelling errors in the game itself, including the characters names. Th...
